Translations.Text: Ai lie fu, lia mu, la yi. Zhexie shi tian jing——mingbai de “gulanjing” de jie wen
Buxindao zhe huoxu yao xiwang tamen yuan shi guishun de
Ni tingren tamen chihe wanle ba! Ni tingren tamen shou xiwang de youhuo ba! Yinwei tamen bujiu jiu hui zhidao de
Wo bu huimie yige chengshi ze yi, dan huimie ta, jiu you yige kezhi de dingqi
Renhe minzu dou buneng xian qi dingqi er miewang, ye buneng hou qi dingqi er lunsang
Tamen shuo:“Shouxiang shi jiaohui de ren a! Ni que shi yige fengzi
Ni zen bu zhaoshi women yixie tianshi ne? Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de.”
Wo zhi ping zhenli er jiang tianshi, dao na shi, tamen shi bu meng huanxing de
Wo que yi jiang shi jiaohui, wo que shi jiaohui de baohu zhe
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianle xuduo shizhe, qu jiaohua gudai de ge zongpai
Meiyou yige shizhe lailin tamen ze yi, dan you shizhe lailin, tamen dou jiayi chaoxiao
Wo zheyang shi aihao chaoxiao shenru zui renmen de xin
Tamen bu xin wo de jiaohui, qishi, guren de changdao yi shiqule
Jiaruo wo wei tamen kaipi yidao tianmen, er tamen cong na dao tianmen jixu deng tian
tamen biding shuo:“Women de yanjing shou mengbile, buran, women shi zhongle moshu de minzhong.”
Wo que yi zai tianshang chuangzaole xuduo gong, wo wei guancha zhe er xiushi tiankong
Wo baohuzhe tian, buxu renhe shou zuzhou de emo deyi qinru
dan qieting de emo ze you mingxian de liuxing gan shang ta
Wo zhankaile dadi, bing ba xuduo shanyue anzhi zai da dishang, erqie shi ge zhong junheng de dongxi sheng chulai
Wo zai da dishang wei nimen he nimen suo buneng gongyang zhe er chuangzaole xuduo shenghuo ziliao
Mei yi zhong shiwu, wo zheli dou you qi cangku, wo zhi yi dingshu jiangxia ta
Wo paiqian zirun de feng, wo cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, yi gongji nimen yinliao, nimen jue bushi yushui de xu cang zhe
Wo que shi neng shi wanwu sheng, neng shi wanwu si de; wo que shi wanwu de jicheng zhe
Wo que yi zhidao nimen zhong xianjin de, wo que yi zhidao nimen zhong houjin de
Ni de zhu biding jihe tamen. Ta que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de
Wo que yi yong heise de chengxing de niantu chuangzaole ren
Yiqian, wo ceng yong liehuo chuangzaole jingling
Dangshi, ni de zhu ceng dui tianshimen shuo:“Wo biding yong heise de niantu suzao renxiang er chuangzao ren
Dang wo ba ta su cheng, erqie ba wo de jingshen chui ru ta de suxiang de shihou, nimen yingdang dui ta fufu koutou.”
Suihou, tianshimen yitong koutou
wei du yi bo lie si bu ken tong jugong zhemen yiqi koutou.(Ta jujue koutou)
Zhu shuo:“Yi bo lie si a! Ni zenme bu koutou ne?”
Ta shuo:“Ni yong heise niantu su chengren xiang er chuangzao ren, wo bu gai xiang ta koutou.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni cong zheli chuqu ba. Yinwei ni que shi bei fangzhu de
Ni bi zao zuzhou, zhidao baoying ri.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni dui wo huanxing, zhidao renlei fuhuo zhi ri.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni que shi bei huanxing de
zhidao kezhi de riqi.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ni yi panding wo shi mi wu de, suoyi wo shi bi zai da dishang yi zui'e youhuo tamen, wo biding yao shi tamen yitong mi wu
Chufei tamen zhong ni suo xuanba de puren.”
Zhu shuo:“Zhe shi wo yingdang weichi de zhenglu
Wo de puren, ni dui tamen jue wu quanli, chufei naxie shuncong ni de mi wu zhe
Huo yu biding shi tamen quanti de yueding di difang
Huo yu you qi daomen, mei dao menjiang shourong tamen zhong bei pai ding de yibufen ren
Jingwei zhemen biding zai yixie leyuan he yuanquan zhi jian
nimen pingping'an'an di jinru leyuan ba!”
Wo qingchu tamen xiongzhong de yuanhen, tamen jiang chengwei dixiong, zai gao ta shang xiang dui er zuo
Tamen zai nali bu ganjue pifa, tamen jue bu bei zhu chu
Ni gaosu wo de pu renmen, wo que shi zhi she de, zhi ci de
wo de xingfa que shi tongku de
Ni yingdang dui tamen xushu yi bo la xin de kerenmen de gushi
Dangshi, tamen jinqu jian ta, shuo:“Zhu ni ping an.” Ta shuo:“Women que shi weiju nimen de.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao weiju, women dique yi yige you zhishi de nan haizi xiang ni baoxi.”
Ta shuo:“Wo yi laomai, nimen hai xiang wo baoxi ma? Nimen yi shenme xiang wo baoxi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women ping zhenli er xiang ni baoxi, suoyi ni buyao juewang.”
Ta shuo:“Chu mi wu zhe wai, shei hui juewang yu an la de enhui ne?”
Ta shuo:“Shizhemen a! Nimen you she me chaishi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women feng pai qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong
Lu te de jiazu chuwai, women que yao ba tamen quanbu jiu chulai
dan ta de qizi chuwai, women yi yuding ta he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa.”
Dang shizhemen lai dao lu te de jiali de shihou
ta shuo:“Nimen que shi yixie mosheng de ren.”
Tamen shuo:“Buran, women ba tamen yixiang zhenglun de (xingfa) dai lai gei nile
Women ba zhenli dai lai gei nile, women que shi chengshi de

Ni yingdang daizhe ni de jiazu zai shenye chuxing, ni yao gen zai tamen de houmian, nimen zhong de renhe ren ye buyao huitou kan. Nimen yingdang wang qian zou, yizhi zou dao nimen fengming daoda di difang.”
Wo qishi ta zhege panjue: Jiushi zhe deng ren, zai zaochen jiang bei genchu
Cheng li de jumin xinran er lai
ta shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de keren, nimen buyao lingru wo
nimen yingdang jingwei an la, nimen buyao xiuru wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women meiyou jinzhi ni yu shiren laiwang ma?”
Ta shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de nu'er, ruguo nimen yao gan shenme.”
Zhi ni de shouming fashi, tamen bi jiang fanghuang yu ziji de diankuang zhi zhong
Nahan sheng zai ri chu shi xijile tamen
Wo shi nage shi zhen tianfandifu, bing shi tao shixiang yudian ban jiangluo zai tamen shenshang
Duiyu neng kaocha zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Nage shi zhen que shi zai yitiao rengran cunzai de daolu shang de
Duiyu xindao zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Na conglin de jumin, que shi bu yi de
Guwo chengzhile tamen. Zhe liang ge difang dou zai pingtan de daolu shang
Shigu de jumin que yi fouren shizhemen
Wo que yi ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, dan tamen beilile ta
Tamen anquan de zao shan wei wu
dan nahan sheng zai zaochen xijile tamen
Tamen suo mouqiu de, duiyu tamen wujiyushi
Wo zhi ping zhenli chuangzao tiandi wanwu, fuhuo shi shi biding lailin de. Suoyi, ni yingdang wenhe di yuanliang zhongren
Ni de zhu que shi chuangzao wanwu de zhu, que shi quanzhi de
Wo que yi shangci ni changchang fanfu songdu de qi jie jing wen he weida de “gulanjing”
Ni buyao jiyu wo suo shi tamen zhong ge deng ren suo xiangshou de shiwu, ni buyao wei tamen er bei'ai. Ni yingdang wenhe di duidai xinshimen
Ni shuo:“Wo que shi tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Na zhengru wo suo jiang shi fenpei zhemen de 〔dongxi〕 yiyang de
tamen ba “gulanjing” fenge cheng ruogan pianduan
Zhi ni de zhu fashi, wo bi jiang tamen quanti jiayi shenwen——
shenwen tamen shengqian de xingwei
Ni yingdang gongkai xuanbu ni suo feng de mingling, erqie bi kai yi wu pei zhu zhe
Zai duifu chaoxiao zhe fangmian, wo bi shi ni manzu
Chaoxiao zhe chu an la wai hai chongbai bie de shenling, bujiu tamen jiu hui zhidaole
Wo que yi zhidao ni wei tamen de lanyan er fanmen
Ni yingdang zansong ni de zhu chaojue wanwu, ni yingdang yu zhongren yiqi koutou
ni yingdang chongbai ni de zhu, zhidao na wuyi de xiaoxi lailin
An la de mingling biding lailin, suoyi nimen bubi yaoqiu qi zaori shixian, zansong an la chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de

Ta shi tianshimen feng ta de mingling, xietong jingshen, jianglin tasuo yiyu de puren, shuo:“Nimen yingdang jinggao shiren shuo: Chu wo zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, suoyi nimen yingdang jingwei wo.”
Ta ping zhenli chuangzaole tiandi, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de
Ta yong jingye chuangzaole ren, er ren que turan bian chengle mingxian de duishou
Ta chuangzaole shengchu, nimen keyi qi mao he pi yuhan, keyi qi ru he rou chongji, hai you xuduo yichu
Nimen ba shengchu gan hui jia huo fang chuqu chi cao de shihou, shengchu duiyu nimen dou you guangcai
Shengchu ba nimen de huowu tuo yun dao nimen xu jing kunnan caineng daoda di difang qu. Nimen de zhu que shi zhiren de, que shi zhi ci de
Ta chuangzao ma, luo, lu, yi gong nimen qi cheng, yi zuo nimen de zhuangshi. Ta hai chuangzao nimen suo bu zhidao de dongxi
An la fuze zhishi zhengdao de zeren. Youxie daolu shi pian xie de, jiaruo ta yiyu, ta bi jiang nimen quanti yinru zhengdao
Ta cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, nimen keyi yong zuo yinliao, nimen lai yi fangmu de shumu yin zhi er shengzhang
Ta wei nimen er shengchan zhuangjia, youganlan, ye zao, putao he ge zhong guoshi. Duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Ta wei nimen er zhifule zhouye he ri yue, qunxing dou shi yin ta de yizhi er bei zhifu de; duiyu neng lijie de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
(Ta you wei nimen er zhifu) tasuo wei nimen chuangzao yu dadi de gese wupin, duiyu neng jiqu jiaohui de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang

Ta zhifu haiyang, yibian nimen yu qu qizhong de xian rou, zuo nimen de shipin; huo caiqu qizhong de zhubao, zuo nimen de zhuangshi. Ni kan chuanbo zai qizhong polang er xing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie
Ta zai dadishang anzhi xuduo shanyue, yimian da di dongdang, er nimen bude anju. Ta kaipi xuduo heliu he daolu, yibian nimen zunxun zhenglu
Ta sheli xuduo biaozhi, tamen jiezhu naxie biaozhi he xingsu er zunxun zhenglu
Nandao zaowuzhu tong buneng chuangzao de (ouxiang) shi yiyang de ma? Nimen zenme bu jiqu jiaohui ne
Ruguo nimen yao jisuan an la de enhui, nimen shi wufa tongji de. An la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
An la zhidao nimen suoyinhui de, he nimen suo biaobai de
Tamen she an la er qidao de buneng chuangzao renhe wu, er tamen shi bei zao de
Tamen shi si de, bushi huo de, tamen lian ziji dou bu zhidao shenme shihou bei fuhuo
Nimen suo yingdang chongbai de shi weiyi de shou chongbai zhe. Buxin houshi de ren, tamen de xin shi fouren de, tamen shi zi da de
Chengran! An la que shi zhidao tamen suo yinhui de, he tamen suo biaobai de, ta que shi bu xi'ai zi da zhe de
Youren wen tamen:“Nimen de zhu ceng jiang shi shenme?” Tamen shuo:“Guren de shenhua”
Yibian tamen zai fuhuo ri chengdan ziji de quanbu zeren, yiji bei tamen wuzhi di jiayi wudao zhe de yibufen zeren. Zhen de, tamen suo chengdan de zhen elie
Qian ren que yi yong jimou, dan an la ba tamen de jianzhu wu chedi jiayi cuihui, er tamen de wuding luo zai tamen de shenshang. Xingfa cong tamen liaoxiang bu dao dao di difang lailin tamen

Ranhou zai fuhuo ri ta yao lingru tamen, bing shenwen tamen shuo:“Wo di naxie huoban——nimen weile tamen er yuxin shimen xiang zhenglun de——rujin zai nali ne?” You xueshi zhe jiangyao shuo:“Lingru he xingfa jinri bi guiyu bu xindao zhe.”
Tamen zai zi kui de qingkuang xia, tianshimen shi tamen siwang. Tamen biaoshi qufu, shuo:“Women meiyou fanguo shen me zui.” Buran! An la que shi quanzhi nimen de xingwei de
Tamen bei ya jin huo yu er yong ju qizhong. Zi da zhe de zhuchu zhen elie

Youren wen jingwei zhe shuo:“Nimen de zhu ceng jiang shi shenme?” Tamen shuo:“Ta jiang shi shan yan.” Xingshan zhe zai jinshi jiang xiangshou meiman de shenghuo, er houshi de zhuzhai que shi geng hao de. Jingwei zhe de zhuzhai zhen youmei
Changzhu de leyuan jiang ren sui tamen jinqu, naxie leyuan xia lin zhu he, qizhong you tamen suo yiyu de. An la zheyang baochou jingwei zhe
Tamen zai lianghao de qingkuang xia, tianshimen shi tamen siwang. Tianshimen dui tamen shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an, nimen keyi yinwei ziji de shangong er jinru leyuan.”

(Bu xindao zhe) zhi neng dengdai tianshimen lailin tamen, huo dengdai ni de zhu de mingling jianglin. Zai tamen zhiqian de ren jiushi zheyang zuo de. An la meiyou kui wang tamen, dan tamen que kui wangle ziji
Suo yi tamen bi zaoshou tamen de xingwei de e bao, er tamen yixiang chaoxiao de (xingfa) jiang baowei tamen

Yi wu pei zhu zhe shuo:“Jiaruo an la yiyu, ze women he women de zuxian bu hui she ta er chongbai renhe wu de, women ye bu hui shanzi jiechu renhe wu de.” Zai tamen zhiqian de ren, ceng zheyang zuoguole. Shizhemen zhi fu mingbai de chuanda de zeren

Wo zai mei ge minzu zhong, que yi paiqian yige shizhe, shuo:“Nimen dang chongbai an la, dang yuanli ta wu te.” Dan tamen zhong you an la suo yindao de, you yingdang mi wu de. Gu nimen dang zai da dishang luxing, yingdang guancha fouren de renmen de jieju shi zenyang de
Ruguo ni rewang tamen huode yindao, name,(ni de rewang shi turan de), an la bu yindao na wudao ren zhe, tamen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe
Tamen zhi an la er fachu zui yanzhong de shiyan, shuo:“An la bu shi siren fuhuo.” Buran! Zhe shi ta yingdang shijian de nuoyan. Dan shiren daban bu zhidao
(Ta jiang shi tamen fuhuo) yibian ta wei tamen chanming tamen suo zhenglun de shifei, bingqie rang bu xindao zhe zhidao ziji yuan shi shuohuang de
Dang wo yao chuangzao yi jian shiwu de shihou, wo zhi dui ta shuo sheng “you”, ta jiu youle
Zai bei yapo zhihou, wei an la er qianju zhe, wo zai jinshi shi bi shi tamen huode yige youmei de zhuchu, houshi de baochou shi geng da de, jiaruo tamen zhidao
Tamen shi jianren de, shi tuo kao tamen de zhu de
Zai ni zhiqian, wo zhi paiqianle wo suo qishi de yixie nanzi. Nimen yingdang qingjiao shen ming jiaohui zhe, ruguo nimen bu zhidao
(Wo ceng paiqian tamen) daizhe yixie mingzheng he jingdian,(qu jiaohua zhongren), wo jiang shi ni jiaohui, yibian ni dui zhongren chanming tamen suo shou de qishi, yibian tamen siwei
Shiyong guiji yi zuo'e zhe, nandao bupa an la shi tamen sui dimian er xianluo, huo xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang lailin tamen ma
Huo zai tamen de lutu zhong chengzhi tamen, er tamen jue buneng taobi
Huo zhujian chengzhi tamen, yinwei nimen de zhu que shi zhi ai de, que shi zhi ci de
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha an la suo chuangzao de wanwu ma? Ge wu de yinying, pianxiang zuobian he youbian, wei an la er koutou, tongshi tamen shi beijian de
Tiandi jian de dongwu he tianshimen, dou zhi wei an la er koutou, tamen bu ganzi da
Tamen weiju zai tamen shangmian de zhuzai, tamen zunxing ziji suo feng de mingling
An la shuo:“Nimen buyao chongbai liang ge zhuzai, ying shou chongbai de, zhishi yige zhuzai. Suoyi, nimen yingdang zhi weiju wo.”
Tiandi wanwu dou shi ta de, zhengjiao shizhong zhi guiyu ta. Nandao nimen she an la er jingwei ta wu ma
Fan nimen suo xiangshou de enhui dou shi cong an la nali jiangxia de. Ranhou, dang nimen zaonan de shihou, nimen zhi xiang ta qidao
Ranhou, dang ta jiechu nimen de huannan de shihou, nimen zhong youyibufen ren, like yi wu pei tamen de zhu
yizhi gufu tasuo shangci tamen de enhui. Nimen xiangshou ba, bujiu nimen jiu yao zhidaole
Wo suo gongji tamen de caichan, tamen yi qizhong de yibufen qu gongfeng naxie wuzhi de (ouxiang). Zhi an la fashi, guanyu nimen suo niezao de (shiwu), nimen bi shoushen wen
Tamen yi nu'er gui an la——zansong an la, chaojue wanwu——er yi tamen suo yuanwang de gui ziji
Dang tamen zhong de yige ren ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, tamen de lian anran shise, erqie manfu laosao
Ta wei zhege ehao er bu yu zongzu huimian, ta duofang kaolu: Jiujing shi renru baoliu ta ne? Haishi ba ta huomai zai tu li ne? Zhen de, tamen de panduan zhen elie
Buxin houshi zhe, you e li; an la you dianxing. Ta que shi quanneng de, que shi zhi rui de

Ruguo an la wei shiren de bu yi er chengzhi tamen, name, ta bu liu yige ren zai dadishang, dan ta rang tamen yanchi dao yige dingqi, dang tamen de dingqi lailin de shihou, tamen bude yanchi yishun shi,(dang qi wei lailin de shihou) tamen buneng tiqian yishun shi
Tamen yi ziji suo yanwu de gui an la, tamen wangyan ziji jiang shou zui jia de baochou. Chengran, tamen jiang shou huo yu de baochou. Tamen shi bei yiqi de

Zhi an la fashi, zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian xuduo shizhe qu jiaohua ge minzu; dan emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, suoyi jintian ta shi tamen de baohu zhe, tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Wo jiang shi zhe bu jingdian, zhi wei shi ni dui tamen chanming tamen suo zhenglun de (shifei), bingqie yi zhe bu jingdian zuowei xindao de minzhong de xiangdao he enhui
An la cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, bing jie yushui shi yi si de da di fuhuo; dui shanyu tinghua de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Zai shengchu zhong, duiyu nimen que youyi zhong jiaoxun. Wo shi nimen de yin na cong shengchu fu nei de fen he xue zhi jian tichu de you chunjie you kekou de ruzhi
Nimen yong ye zao he putao niang zhi chunjiu he jiamei de jiyang, duiyu neng lijie de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Ni de zhu ceng qishi mifeng:“Ni keyi zai shanshang he shu shang zhu fang, yiji renmen suo jianzao de fengfang li

Ranhou, ni cong mei zhong guoshi shang chi yidian, bing xunfu de zunxun ni de zhu de daolu.” Jiang youyi zhong yanse butong, er keyizhi bing de yinliao, cong ta de fu zhong tu chulai; duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que you yi zhong jixiang

An la chuangzao nimen, ranhou shi nimen siwang. Nimen zhong youren fu fan yu yisheng zhong zui elie de jieduan, yi zhi ta zai you zhishi zhihou you bian de yi wu suo zhi. An la que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de

Zai jiyang shang, an la shi nimen zhong yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren, jiyang youhou zhe jue bu yuan ba ziji de jiyang rang ji ziji de nupu, cong'er tamen zai jiyang shang yu ziji pingdeng. Nandao tamen fouren an la de enhui ma
An la yi nimen de tonglei zuo nimen de qizi, bing wei nimen cong qizi chuangzao ersun. An la hai yi jiamei de shiwu gongji nimen. Nandao tamen xinyang xuwang, er gufu zhu en ma
Tamen she an la er chongbai (ouxiang), na shi buneng wei tamen zhuchi cong tianshang jiangxia de he cong dishang shengchu de yidian jiyang de, erqie hao wu nengli de
Nimen buyao wei an la da biyu. An la zhidao, er nimen bu zhidao

An la da yige biyu: Yige nuli, buneng ziyou chuli renhe shiwu; yige ziyou ren, wo shangci ta youhou de jiyang, er ta mimi de he gongkai di jiayi shishe; ta lia ren shi yiyang de ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Dan tamen daban bu zhidao

An la you da yige biyu: Liang ge nanren, yige shi yaba, shenme shi ye buneng zuo, que shi ta zhuren de leizhui, wulun zhuren dafa ta dao nali qu, dou buneng dai yidian fuli huilai; ling yige zou de shi zhenglu, ta quan ren zhuchi gongdao. Ta lia ren shi yiyang de ma
Tiandi de youxuan zhishi an la de. Fuhuo shike de daolai, zhi zai zhuan shunjian, huo geng wei xunsu. An la duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de
An la shi nimen cong mu fu chusheng, nimen shenme ye bu zhidao, ta wei nimen chuangzao ermu he xinling, yibian nimen ganxie
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai kongzhong bei zhifu de qun niao ma? Zhiyou an la weichi tamen; duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang

An la yi nimen de jia wei nimen de anju zhi suo, yi shengchu de pige, wei nimen de fangwu, nimen zai qicheng zhi ri he zhu dingzhi ri, dou ganjue qi qingbian. Ta yi mianyangmao, luotuo mao he shan yang mao gong nimen zhizao jiaju he zhanshi de xiangshou

An la yi tasuo chuangzao de dongxi zuo nimen de zhe yin, yi qun shan zuo nimen de yinni chu, yi yifu gong nimen fangshu (he yuhan), yi kuijia gong nimen fangyu chuangshang. Ta ruci wancheng ta dui nimen de enhui, yibian nimen shunfu
Ruguo tamen weibei zhengdao, name, ni zhi fu mingbai chuanda de zeren
Tamen renshi an la de enhui, dan jiayi fouren, tamen daban shi wang'enfuyi de
Zai na ri, wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong tuiju yige jianzheng zhe, ranhou, buxindao zhe bude wei ziji bianhu, ye bude xiang tamen taohao
Dang bu yi zhe kanjian xingfa de shihou, tamen bude jianxing, ye bude huanxing

Dang yi wu pei zhu zhe kanjian tamen de pei zhu de shihou, tamen jiangyao shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zhexie shi women de pei zhu, women ceng she ni er qidao tamen.” Naxie pei zhujiang huida tamen shuo:“Nimen que shi shuohuang de.”
Zai na ri, tamen jiang xiang an la biaoshi qufu, er tamen suo niezao zhe jiang huibi tamen
Buxindao erqie zu'ai zhu dao zhe, wo jiang yin tamen de pohuai er zengjia tamen suo shou de xingfa

Wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong, tuiju tamen zu zhong de yige jianzheng, lai fanzheng tamen, zai na ri, wo yao tuiju ni lai fanzheng zhe deng ren. Wo ceng jiang shi ni zhe bu jingdian, chanming wanshi, bing zuo guishun zhe de xiangdao, enhui he xixun
An la dique ming ren gongping, xingshan, shi ji qinqi, bing jin ren yinluan, zuo'e shi, badao; ta quan jie nimen, yibian nimen jiqu jiaohui
Dang nimen dijie mengyue de shihou, nimen yingdang luxing. Nimen ji yi an la wei nimen de baozheng zhe, ze dijie mengyue zhihou jiu buyao weibei shiyan. An la dique zhidao nimen de xingwei

Nimen buyao xiang nage fu ren, ta ba fangzhi de hen jieshi de xian you fen chai cheng ruogan lu; nimen yi mengshi wei huxiang qizha de shouduan, yinwei zhe yizu bi na yizu hai yao fushu. An la zhi yi ci shi kaoyan nimen. Fuhuo ri, ta bi wei nimen chanming nimen suo zhenglun de shifei
Jiaruo an la yiyu, ta bi shi nimen chengwei yige minzu; dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe wu ru mitu, shi tasuo yiyu zhe zunxun zhenglu. Nimen shibiyao wei nimen de xingwei er shoushen wen
Nimen buyao yi mengshi wei huxiang qizha de shouduan; yimian zhan wen zhihou zai shizu, er nimen jiang yinwei zu'ai an la de dadao er changshi zaihuo, nimen hai yao shou zhongda de xingfa
Nimen buyao yi lianjia chumai an la de mengyue; zai an la nali de, duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen zhidao
Nimen suoyou de shi yao hao jin de, zai an la nali de shi wuqiong de. Wo shi biyao yi jianren zhe suo xing de zuida shangong baochou nimen
Fan xingshan de nannu xinshi, wo shi biyao shi tamenguo yi zhong meiman de shenghuo, wo shi bi yao yi tamen suo xing de zuida shangong baochou tamen
Dang ni yao songdu “gulanjing” de shihou, ni yingdang qiu an la baohu, yi fang shou zuzhou de emo de ganrao
Dui xindao erqie tuo kao an la zhe, ta hao wu quanli
Ta de quanli zhi xianyu he ta jiao pengyou, erqie yi ta pei zhu zhe
Dang wo yi yi jie jing wen diaohuan ling yi jie jing wen de shihou——an la zhidao ziji suo jiang shi de——tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige niezao zhe.” Buran! Tamen daban shi bu zhidao de
Ni (dui tamen) shuo: Shengjie de lu ha cong ni de zhu nali jiang shi zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian, yibian ta shi xindao zhe jianding, bingyong zuo gui xinzhe de xiangdao he xixun
Wo dique zhidao, tamen shuoguo:“Zhe zhishi yige fanren suo chuanshou de.” Tamen qingxiang di nage ren de yuyan shi hua wairen (de yuyan), er zhe (bu jingdian de yuyan) shi mingbai de alabo yu
Bu xin an la de jixiang zhe, an la biding bu yindao tamen, er tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Bu xin an la de jixiang zhe, cai shi niezaole huangyan de
Ji xin'an la zhihou, you biaoshi buxin zhe——chufei bei po xuanbu buxin, neixin que wei xinyang er jianding zhe——wei buxin er xinqing shuchang zhe jiang zao tianqian, bing shou zhongda de xingfa
Zhe shi yinwei tamen ning ai jinshi shenghuo er bu ai houshi, ye yin wei an la bu yindao buxindao de minzhong
Tamen shi an la jiang fengbi qi xinling he shiting de ren. Zhe deng ren shi hun kui de
Chengran, tamen zai houshi zheng shi kui she zhe
Ranhou, ni de zhu duiyu bei pohai zhihou qianju, ranhou fendou, erqie jianren zhe, ni de zhu zai na zhihou que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Zai na ri, mei ge linghun dou lai wei ziji bianhu, er mei ge linghun dou de xiangshou ziji xingwei de wanquan de baochou. Tamen bu shou kui wang

An la da yige biyu: Yige shi zhen, yuan shi anquan de, anwen de, fengfu de jiyang cong ge fang yun lai, dan zhen shang de jumin gufu an la de enhui, suoyi an la yin tamen de xingwei er shi tamen changshi jidu de jihuang he kongbu
Tamen zu zhong de yige shizhe que yi lailin tamen, dan tamen fourenle ta. Zai tamen bu yi de qingkuang xia, xingfa xijile tamen
Nimen keyi chi an la shangci nimen de hefa er jiamei de shiwu, nimen yingdang ganxie an la de enhui, ruguo nimen zhi chongbai ta
Ta zhi jinzhi nimen chi zi si wu, xieye, zhurou, yiji song fei an la zhi ming er tuzai de. Dan wei shi suo po, fei chu ziyuan, qie buguo fen zhe, name, an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Nimen duiyu ziji suo xushu de shi, buyao wangyan:“Zhe shi hefa de, na shi weifa de.” Yizhi nimen jiajie an la de mingyi er zaoyao. Jiajie an la de mingyi er zaoyao zhe bi bu chenggong
(Tamen zhide) dao yidian xiangshou, er tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Dui youtai jiaotu, wo ceng jin jie wo congqian gaosuguo ni di naxie shiwu, wo meiyou kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji
Ranhou, ni de zhu duiyu wuzhi er zuo'e, yihou you huiguo zi xin de ren, que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Yi bo la xin yuanlai shi yige biaoshuai, ta fucong an la, xinfeng zhengjiao, erqie bushi yi wu pei zhu de
Ta yuan shi ganxie zhu en de, zhu xuanzele ta, bing jiang ta yin shangle zhenglu
Zai jinshi, wo ceng yi xingfu shangci ta; zai houshi, ta biding juyu shanren zhi lie
Ranhou, wo qishi ni shuo:“Ni yingdang zunshou xinfeng zhengjiao de yi bo la xin de zongjiao, ta bushi yi wu pei zhu de.”
Anxiri shi naxie wei zhi er zhenglun de ren suo yingdang zunshou de dingzhi. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei

Ni ying ping zhihui heshan yan er quan ren zunxun zhu dao, ni yingdang yi zui youmei de taidu yu ren bianlun, ni de zhu dique zhidao shei shi weibei ta de zhengdao de, ta dique zhidao shei shi zunxun ta de zhengdao de
Ruguo nimen yao baofu, jiu yingdang yizhao nimen suo shou de shanghai er baofu. Ruguo nimen rongren, na duiyu rongren zhe shi geng hao de
Ni yingdang rongren,——ni de rongren zhi lai an la de youzhu——ni buyao wei tamen er beishang, buyao wei tamen de jimou er fannao
An la que shi tong jingwei zhe he xingshan zhe zai yiqi de
